feedback: Color: Image 1 background is #E74C3C, while Image 2 background is slightly different, possibly #FF5733.
Typography: Image 1 uses a regular font weight, while Image 2 uses a bold font weight.
Typography: Image 1 text is smaller, approximately 12px, while Image 2 text is larger, approximately 14px.
Spacing: Image 2 has more padding around the text, approximately 4px more on each side.
Shape: Image 1 is a rectangle with sharp corners, while Image 2 is an oval with rounded edges.
Adjust the background color in Image 2 to match #E74C3C.
Change the font weight in Image 2 to match the regular weight of Image 1.
Reduce the font size in Image 2 to approximately 12px.
Decrease the padding in Image 2 to match the spacing in Image 1.
Modify the shape of Image 2 to have sharp corners like Image 1.
